collected.name: Camera Photos
options: Collected only when selected by the user for upload

collected.name: Access to storage
options: This application may access the file system to store and retrieve files that are too large to fit in memory

shared.name: Government
shared.description: Sharing with the government, except where required by law or expressly permitted in an emergency.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share with them unless the law says we have to.

shared.name: Data Resellers
shared.description: Companies that sell your info to other companies for multiple purposes, including offering you relevant products.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.

shared.name: Data Analytics
shared.description: Companies that collect and analyze your data.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.

shared.name: Systems & Platforms
shared.description: Software companies that power your device, app stores or companies that provide developers with info about app consumers.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.

shared.name: Other Apps
shared.description: Other apps by companies that you may not have a relationship with.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.

shared.name: Social Networks
shared.description: Companies that facilitate relationships and sharing between people with common interests.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.

shared.name: Ad Networks
shared.description: Companies that display ads to you through apps.
shared.emptyText: We DON'T share your information with them.
